item.description:
We never got to do a Happy Hour at Roomba before it closed, but if you have ever been to Roomba, you probably miss it.

You are in luck, Bespoke, owner of the former Roomba is now open on Mondays and it is the best of both worlds. With a New York style restaurant, a latin lounge and a rooftop bar, there is something for everyone.

Okay, no specials, but it is still worth checking out for a Monday Happy Hour. It is to the left of the Owl Shop.

They may put us in our own room so look for us downstairs in the lounge if we are not in the main bar.

www.bespokenewhaven.com
item.name: Multi-Level Happy Hour
